consortium_data_standard.description: The consortium data standard used for the submssion. At the moment SPARC is the only supported standard in pysoda. Future support for HEAL is planned.

funding_consortium.description: The name of the funding consortium that supported the research. Examples include BRAIN Initiative, Allen Institute, etc.

award_number.description: The award number associated with the funding. This is typically a unique identifier assigned by the funding agency. TODO: Check regex coverage for RE-JOIN before applying pattern.

milestone_achieved.description: A list of milestones achieved in the research. This should include specific goals or objectives that were met during the project.

milestone_completion_date.description: The date when the milestone was completed. This should be in ISO 8601 format.
